name: Full Stack Web Development Coding Bootcamp
description: In June '19 I joined the CraftAcademy's Full Stack Web Development Coding Bootcamp. 12 weeks of intensive learning, coding and developing diverse projects from back-end to front-end.

name: Corporate Trainer
description: As the Trainer on the Travellink project, my main role was to train new hires arriving to the company on the company's procedures and on Amadeus GDS basics. I also work with upskilling the more experienced agents on advanced GDS practices. At the same time I offered support to the online and back-office agents as an advisor.

name: Corporate Trainer
description: Just before completing my first year in the company, I was invited to join the Training Team, providing the training to new hires and developing active agents' skill set.

name: Customer Service Representative
description: eDreams Odigeo is one of the biggest Online Travel Agency Groups. Here I offered support to clients on the Portuguese, Spanish and English speaking markets managing every type of requests regarding their bookings.

name: Designer and Marketeer
description: Here I was in charge of all the companyâ€™s advertisement, from the marketing strategies to the creation of media content. I also built websites, promo-videos, and managed social media

name: Multimedia Design Degree
description: With this university degree I acquired expertise in many different areas such as Graphic Design, Web Design, Motion Graphics, Marketing, Advertisement, Photography and Video editting, Animation, among others.
